name.bg,bn,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: WA Group Sender & Group Link Scraper

short.ar: WA Group Sender is a Simple Group Messages Sender to All WhatsApp Groups for free
short.am: A free, safe and fast WA group messaging extension. Help you manage your WA groups, communities and broadcasts more easily and…
short.bg: Help you manage your WA groups, communities and broadcasts more easily and efficiently!
short.bn: It is a powerful tool that helps you manage your WhatsApp groups. Extract WhatsApp group member's phone number to Excel
short.ca,cs,de,el,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,gu: Scrape thousands WhatsApp group links and mass join. Extract WhatsApp group member's phone number to Excel
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Group Messages Sender, Scrape thousands WhatsApp group links and mass join. Extract WhatsApp group member's phone number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
#1 WhatsApp group finder & group message sender.

WAGroup automatically scrape WhatsApp group links in any website, mass join group then extracts group member's phone number to Excel, even auto send group messages.

What WA Group Scraper does for you:
* B2B Lead Generation
* Sales Prospecting Tool
* Marketing

# v1.0.4 UPDATE
- Fixed an issue causing WhatsApp to get stuck.

# FEATURES

✓ Find WhatsApp group links on any website.
✓ Send message to all groups
✓ Mass Join all groups
✓ Mass Leave all groups
✓ Export group members to Excel/CSV/JSON/VCard

WA TOOL FAMILY
You can explore our additional WhatsApp tools by selecting the tools menu
- WA Sender - Send messages to multiple recipients
- WA Contact Saver - Export and save contacts and group members

# FAQ

https://wagroup.whatsabot.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@whatsabot.com.

# DATA PRIVACY

All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you exported.

# STATEMENT

WhatsApp™ is a trademark of Facebook Inc. WAGroup is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to WhatsApp, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
